header.rec_loc: In a village, in ANON’s house.
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Animals, TV, words, films, games, food, day-to-day matters, shopping, accents, family, past events, work/future.
header.activity: Family talking about various categories of life and day-to-day matters.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, requesting, anecdote telling
